panels.description: The total number of sessions for the selected period.
panels.title: Total number of sessions

panels.description: The Success Rate measures player reliability as the ratio of START to ERROR events, excluding failures caused by blocked reasons or unsupported DRM errors.

targets.query:
event_name:ERROR
AND NOT data.error_type:DRM_NOT_SUPPORTED
AND data.business_error:false
AND session.device.id:${device_id}

panels.title: Success Rate

panels.description: This timeline illustrates the specific time intervals during which access to media by the current IP address was restricted based on its geographical location.
panels.title: Restriction Timeline
